**[World Athletics]**(https://thomascamminady.github.io/world-athletics-database/)
Some 400k+ entries with performances of track and field athletes.

**[Tour de France](https://github.com/thomascamminady/LeTourDataSet)**

Every cyclist and stage of the Tour de France (up to including 2022) in two CSV files.


**[Alltime Athletics](https://github.com/thomascamminady/alltime_athletics_python)**

Scrapes Peter Larsson's website Alltime Athletics.

**[Abiturnoten data set](https://github.com/thomascamminady/abiturnoten)**

German Abitur: Grade distribution over time.
